maintenanceEvent.eventDescription: NUDS-Hoard records generated by Ethan Gruber from spreadsheets Disnarda Pinilla cleaned from the IGCH records.s

noteSet.note: The list above comprises 176 specimens recorded by Houghton and Le Rider and 157 specimens listed by Strauss. There may be some overlapping between the two records. According to Strauss and Fischer the two lots should be connected with the Susiana hoard from 1958 or 1959, no. 1805 above, and the discovery lowered accordingly

contents.description: 2+ AV, c. 485 AR, 5+ AE. Found with AR medallion: 331 coins noted in IGCH. Added 161 AR coins to the hoard contents. Then, the total count comes to 492 coins
